content.rendered:
Directed by Skye Borgman.

Cast Janis Cox (Self – Lori Vallow’s Mother). Kelsee Ryan (Self – Colby Ryan’s Wife). Justin Lum (Self – Investigative Reporter). April Raymond (Self – Lori Vallow’s Former Friend). Annie Cushing (Self – Lori Vallow’s Ex Sister-in-Law). Vaisia Itaaehau (Self – Tylee’s Friend). John Matthias (Self – Forensic Psychologist). Julie Rowe (Self – Chad Daybell’s Former Friend). Barry Cox (Self – Lori Vallow’s Father). Joshua Vallow (Self – Lori Vallow’s Son). Benjamin/Ep Hyde (Self – Chad Daybell’s Friend)

Language English.

Producers Jonathan Chinn. Simon Chinn. Gloria Coronado-Myatt. Todd Garner. Ayanna Hart. James Haygood. David Kraemer. Katherine LeBlond. Stephen Neely. Anna Marie Pitman. Maura Anderson. Nabwire Butali. Julieann Galdames.

Production Lightbox Productions.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 3

Status Finished (4)
